Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/improve/1784256462227501056/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Quillbot | Content Rewrite | Rephrase"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/improve/1784256462227501056/)_"
---
I want you to act as an [TARGETLANGUAGE] Content rewriter spelling corrector and improver. I will give you text content in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. rewrite it and output that  in the corrected and improved version of my text, in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. I want you to replace my simplified A0-level words and sentences with more beautiful and elegant, upper-level [TARGETLANGUAGE] words and sentences. Keep the meaning the same, but make them more literary. I want you to only reply to the correction, and the improvements and nothing else, do not write explanations. my first text is "[PROMPT]"
